description: Main entry point for the Flutter-based 'Modern Book Reader' app. This file sets up environment variables, initializes app-wide providers for services like authentication, book management, reading progress, and synchronization, and defines the main application widget with theme and routing configuration. It also contains the app's entry widget that handles user authentication state to direct users appropriately to the home or login screens.

classes.name: BookApp
classes.description: The root widget that sets up theme, routing, and state providers for the application.

classes.name: AppEntryPoint
classes.description: Handles user authentication state to route to either the home screen or login screen.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Initializes bindings, loads environment variables, and runs the Flutter app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the BookApp, setting themes, routes, and providers.
